column1: The chain of command in the GOP on this issue is coming into a clearer focus. Putin tells Trump #Ukraine was responsible. Trump tells Republicans in Congress and then together they spread this conspiracy theory to the American people. https://t.co/GW0bSQ64HU #PutinToldme
The Post reports that a former senior White House official said Trump said he knew that #Ukraine was the one responsible for attacking our election because " #Putintoldme ."

.@washingtonpost released a bombshell report that the President was influenced by Putin in his belief that #Ukraine and NOT #Russia interfered in our 2016 Presidential election.  https://t.co/9FcPjLYHlg
Fiona Hill on Ukraine interfering in our elections: “Fictional Narrative”  Putin: “It was Ukraine”  Trump and his GOP allies: "I heard it was Ukraine."  https://t.co/xUJuOQGl48
There are two major differences between @GretaThunberg and my GOP colleagues: she believes in science and she has the courage to stand up to @realDonaldTrump.
Happy Thanksgiving from our family to yours.
If they are unable to get a time machine - they can always join the rest of Congress in investigating and analyzing the facts and evidence. 4/4

They are instead hell bent at going back and understanding the President’s “state of mind”. In order to investigate his "state of mind" they are going to need three things: 1. time machine 2. crystal ball 3. blindfold. 3/4
Republican’s don’t want to talk about the President’s alleged bribery and extortion scheme ( AKA the “events in question”).  2/4

Breaking Republican Strategy MEMO on Impeachment Released.  It states “To appropriately understand the events in question - and most importantly assess the @realDonaldTrump state of mind during his interaction with President Zelensky...” 1/4
@realDonaldTrump We already have though. We have also found the whistleblower and his name is Donald J. Trump.

In February House Democrats acted to curb gun violence and passed H.R. 8 The Bipartisan Background Checks Act. It’s been over 200 days and the @SenateGOP has yet to take action. @senatemajldr refuses to even put the bill to a vote. https://t.co/NsFca7VfPk
The American people have a right to fully review President's Trump's actions through public hearings & release of transcripts.
Although I am saddened that the President's actions have pushed us to this point I do believe it is necessary to move forward to the next phase of the process.
Yesterday I joined the majority of my colleagues in voting for a resolution that sets the ground rules for the next steps in the impeachment inquiry of President Trump.
In my role as a Foreign Affairs Committee Subcommittee Chairman I have participated in the investigative depositions with colleagues from both sides of the aisle. https://t.co/LCG4v3SRYN

The world is a better place because of MarDee and we could all do well by trying to emulate her – the world needs more MarDee X’s.   Tevis and I send our love to her husband John their children and their grandchildren.

The South Coast has lost a giant. MarDee personified what was best in the legal political educational and civic fields. She would talk to Presidents or someone in need with the same respect and dignity.

Tevis and I are saddened to learn of the passing of our dear friend MarDee Xifaras earlier today. I had the honor of representing Massachusetts on the Democratic National Committee alongside MarDee and more importantly had the honor of calling her a friend.

I won’t hold my breath waiting for the New Yorker to break my door down with a contract but this came to me between reading the Sunday papers and the start of the Sunday morning shows today... #mapoli https://t.co/0DYoOD9nXZ

**Warning Graphic Content** After your heart sinks from watching this. Ask yourself this question “Is this the America we want our kids to go to school in?” The Senate and the President must act now. @sandyhook #GunControlNow https://t.co/HcOd3WsiZo

You’re not a dictator or a king. We are a democracy. If you truly cared about the American worker you could decouple your family’s business interest today. You won’t. That would require you to care about something other than yourself.
You can ensure that your personal businesses stop benefitting from relationships with Chinese state backed companies. #trumpsdecouplewithChina  https://t.co/hUa0J6nGH6
You can ask Ivanka to rescind any and all trademarks and any other further trademark applications she has with China. #trumpsdecouplewithChina https://t.co/SP6DtUqZ8Q

Mr. President you may not know this but in America our businesses are not state run. You don’t have the authority to order American businesses on how they should conduct business. You can lead by example though. You can decouple your family’s business interest in China. https://t.co/Hq3lcahtF6
I’m rooting for Josh Chris and everyone else who battles this disease on a daily basis.

As @c_herren rightfully points out Josh Gordon is dealing with a medical issue for which he needs treatment. As with any medical issue patients should have the access to care for as long as they should need it.  https://t.co/WnQchL238x

For too long substance abuse disorder has carried a negative stigma that makes it more difficult for many to address issues with mental health and impedes access to appropriate and effective treatment. https://t.co/WnQchL238x
Keeping Americans safe from domestic terrorism should not be subject to political determinations. https://t.co/zizNCfdIpE

I went straight from the airport yesterday to the #NewBedford Lights for Liberty vigil. We stood in the pouring rain with a shared message: to end the suffering and inhumane practices of the Trump administration at the border. https://t.co/EPK98XMCJl
.@realDonaldTrump call off the raids and end family separation. Show that you have an ounce of humanity and do the right thing. #ma09 #mapoli https://t.co/0YIpjQiN64

Today the 5th Circuit is hearing arguments in Texas v. Azar the Republicans’ latest challenge to the Affordable Care Act. Texas v. Azar cuts to the core of the healthcare divide between Dems and GOP. https://t.co/5Bpsu3OX1i
...putting together a real plan that will rebuild America's crumbling infrastructure and so much more. #ma09 #mapoli

...protecting voting rights so that Americans are ensured of their sacred right to vote at the ballot box dealing with climate change now to demand real action to our climate crisis lowering health care costs and prescription drug prices ...

And we are not close to being done. We are moving forward on issues important to the American people including an effort to end discrimination against LBGTQ Americans putting in place protections for America's "Dreamers" and TPS holders...
H. Con. Res. 24 A Resolution to release the complete and full Mueller Report. #ReleaseTheReport
H Res.124 Opposition to banning service of Transgender individuals in the Armed Services
S.J. Res.54 The Yemen War Powers Resolution House and Senate passed resolution to direct the removal of United States Armed Forces from hostilities in Yemen that have not been authorized by Congress.
HR. 676 The NATO Support Act reaffirming America's commitment to this vital alliance.
HR. 1585 The Violence Against Woman Reauthorization Act which provide protections for survivors of domestic violence.
HR. 1644 Save the Internet Act overwhelmingly popular legislation that will restore net neutrality protections that were removed by the Trump Administration.
HR. 7 The Paycheck Fairness Act to secure equal pay for equal work
HR. 8 The Bipartisan Background Checks Act an effort make our communities safer and lower gun violence. HR. 1112 Enhanced Background Checks Act addresses the "Charleston Loophole"
HR. 1 The We People Act To Restore Democracy a bold transformative set of reforms designed to strengthen our democracy and return power to the people
Since the moment we were sworn in the Democratic Majority has gone right to work already passing several pieces of legislation:

As a member of the Massachusetts Congressional delegation I want to keep you updated on the Democratic Majority's incredible progress to deliver on our promise on moving forward on issues that matter most to our citizens. #ma09 #mapoli
